name: Graviturgy Magic
description: Mages who manipulate the forces of gravity to hinder foes and aid allies.

2.name: Adjust Density
2.description: As an action, halve or double the weight of a creature or object you can see within 30 feet for up to 1 minute (concentration). Halved weight increases speed by 10 feet and jump distance but imposes disadvantage on Strength checks and saves; doubled weight reduces speed by 10 feet and grants advantage on Strength checks and saves. At 10th level you can target Huge or smaller.

6.name: Gravity Well
6.description: Whenever you cast a spell on a creature, you can move the target 5 feet to an unoccupied space if it is willing, the spell hits, or it fails the save.

10.name: Violent Attraction
10.description: When a creature within 60 feet hits with a weapon attack, use your reaction to deal an extra 1d10 damage of the weapon's type, or increase fall damage a creature takes by 2d10. Uses equal to your Intelligence modifier per long rest.

14.name: Event Horizon
14.description: As an action, emit a field of crushing gravity for up to 1 minute (concentration). Hostile creatures starting their turn within 30 feet make a Strength save or take 2d10 force damage and have speed 0 until next turn; on a success they take half damage and movement is doubled in cost. Use once per long rest or by expending a 3rd-level spell slot.
